hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y gcc g++ make libncurses5-dev libreadline6-dev libssl-dev libgdbm-dev libc6-dev libsqlite3-dev libbz2-dev xz-utils patch wget tar curl patch bzip2
# Add python group if it doesn't exist #getent group python || groupadd python
# Add python user if it doesn't exist, create home directory #id python || useradd -r -g python python #mkdir -p /home/python #chown -R python:python /home/python
# Make, Run tests as python user #su python -c "sh -s" <<EOF #cd /home/python mkdir src_root cd src_root wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.5.2/Python-3.5.2.tar.xz tar -xvf Python-3.5.2.tar.xz cd Python-3.5.2 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --exec-prefix=/usr/local make make test #skipping tests as OSError: [Errno 39] Directory not empty: '/tmp/tmp18i64ndj' is encountered which is specific to containers #tests passes on host vm
#EOF
#cd /home/python/Python-3.5.1 sudo make install
python_version=$(python3 --version 2>&1)
echo $python_version > output.txt
echo 'Python 3.5.2' > expected.txt result=`diff output.txt expected.txt`
if [ -z "$result" ] ; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
